Paper.Title: Fine-Grained Hidden Markov Modeling for Broadcast- News Story Segmentation

Section.Paragraph: We present the design and development of a Hidden Markov Model for the division of news broadcasts into story segments.

Model topology, and the textual features used, are discussed, together with the non-parametric estimation techniques that were employed for obtaining estimates for both transition and observation probabilities. Visualization methods developed for the analysis of system performance are also presented.
